description: Document model for a customer's subscription to a service offering. Tracks active subscriptions, usage, billing projections, and auto-renewal status.
name: ServiceSubscription

operations.description: Initializes the subscription with offering and customer details
operations.name: INITIALIZE_SUBSCRIPTION
operations.schema:
input InitializeSubscriptionInput {
    id: PHID!
    customerId: PHID!
    customerName: String
    serviceOfferingId: PHID!
    serviceOfferingTitle: String
    resourceTemplateId: PHID!
    selectedTierId: OID!
    createdAt: DateTime!
    lastModified: DateTime!
}
operations.template: Initializes the subscription with offering and customer details

operations.description: Activates the subscription with start date and billing period
operations.name: ACTIVATE_SUBSCRIPTION
operations.template: Activates the subscription with start date and billing period

operations.description: Cancels the subscription by setting autoRenew to false. Subscription remains ACTIVE until period ends, then becomes EXPIRED.
operations.name: CANCEL_SUBSCRIPTION
operations.template: Cancels the subscription by setting autoRenew to false. Subscription remains ACTIVE until period ends, then becomes EXPIRED.

operations.description: Marks the subscription as expired when period ends and autoRenew is false

errors.description: Cannot expire a subscription that has autoRenew enabled
errors.name: SubscriptionStillActiveError

operations.name: EXPIRE_SUBSCRIPTION
operations.template: Marks the subscription as expired when period ends and autoRenew is false

modules.description: Operations for managing tier and pricing
modules.name: Tier Selection

errors.description: Cannot change tier in current subscription status
errors.name: InvalidTierChangeError

operations.name: CHANGE_TIER

operations.description: Sets the pricing details for the subscription
operations.name: SET_PRICING
operations.schema:
input SetPricingInput {
    amount: Amount_Money!
    currency: Currency!
    billingCycle: BillingCycle!
    setupFee: Amount_Money
    lastModified: DateTime!
}
operations.template: Sets the pricing details for the subscription

operations.description: Adds an optional add-on to the subscription

errors.description: This add-on has already been added
errors.name: DuplicateAddonIdError

operations.name: ADD_ADDON
operations.template: Adds an optional add-on to the subscription

operations.description: Removes an add-on from the subscription

errors.description: Add-on with the specified ID does not exist
errors.name: AddonNotFoundError

operations.name: REMOVE_ADDON
operations.template: Removes an add-on from the subscription

operations.description: Sets the selected facet option for a category
operations.name: SET_FACET_SELECTION
operations.template: Sets the selected facet option for a category

operations.name: REMOVE_FACET_SELECTION

modules.description: Operations for processor-driven billing projections and cached snippets
modules.name: Billing Projection

operations.description: Updates computed billing projection fields. Called by processor, not by editor.
operations.name: UPDATE_BILLING_PROJECTION
operations.template: Updates computed billing projection fields. Called by processor, not by editor.

operations.description: Updates cached display names for customer and offering. Called by processor.
operations.name: SET_CACHED_SNIPPETS
operations.template: Updates cached display names for customer and offering. Called by processor.

global.schema:
type ServiceSubscriptionState {
    id: PHID!
    customerId: PHID!
    customerName: String
    serviceOfferingId: PHID!
    serviceOfferingTitle: String
    resourceTemplateId: PHID!
    selectedTierId: OID!
    status: SubscriptionStatus!
    autoRenew: Boolean!
    pricing: SubscriptionPricing
    selectedAddons: [SelectedAddon!]!
    facetSelections: [FacetSelection!]!
    startDate: DateTime
    currentPeriodStart: DateTime
    currentPeriodEnd: DateTime
    cancelledAt: DateTime
    cancellationReason: String
    cancelEffectiveDate: DateTime
    nextBillingDate: DateTime
    projectedBillAmount: Amount_Money
    projectedBillCurrency: Currency
    createdAt: DateTime!
    lastModified: DateTime!
}

enum SubscriptionStatus {
    PENDING
    ACTIVE
    EXPIRED
}

type SubscriptionPricing {
    amount: Amount_Money!
    currency: Currency!
    billingCycle: BillingCycle!
    setupFee: Amount_Money
}

enum BillingCycle {
    MONTHLY
    QUARTERLY
    SEMI_ANNUAL
    ANNUAL
    ONE_TIME
}

type SelectedAddon {
    id: OID!
    optionGroupId: OID!
    addedAt: DateTime!
}

type FacetSelection {
    id: OID!
    categoryKey: String!
    selectedOptionId: String!
}
